Description: All entity IDs must be unique within the knowledge graph
Each entity type has ontology-required fields (Metric: measurement_type/metric_type/unit/code/description; Model: description/equation/input_variables; Category: section_title)
DirectMetric/CalculatedMetric must have code (not N/A); Quantitative metrics must have units (not N/A)
Models must have non-empty input_variables list
All relationships must use ontology-defined predicates: ConsistOf, Include, IsCalculatedBy, ReportUsing, RequiresInputFrom
All Metrics with metric_type='CalculatedMetric' must have IsCalculatedBy relationship to a Model
